filltheblankspython

Class WordSwitcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • filltheblankspython.WordSwitcher

  • public class WordSwitcher
extends java.lang.Object
    The WordSwitcher class is used to do the switching of Words in the ArrayLists.

    • Method Detail

      • setMaxMoves

        public void setMaxMoves(int diff,
                        int blanks)
        This method sets the maximum amount of word switches the user can make to complete this exercise. It invokes the method setMovesLeft in the Main class to give users visual feedback about how many moves they have at the beginning of the round.
        Parameters:
        diff - the difficulty of the game
        blanks - the amount of blanked out words in the code

      • resetMoves

        public void resetMoves()
        Resets the moves back to the original moves

        Simple test to see if all the switches have been used by the player

      • isWord2

        public boolean isWord2()
        A method to decide which word the selected word on the GUI is.
        Returns:
        if Word2 is blank or not.

        public boolean whichWord()

      • oldChangePlaces

        public void oldChangePlaces()

      • needSwitch

        public void needSwitch()
        This method works out when a switch between or within ArrayLists need to be done. If so it launches the method for changing the places and then resets the class back to defaults. The method also works out if the same word has been chosen twice.

      • addMoves

        public void addMoves(int num)
        Gives the user more moves. Used for when answers are wrong and the user needs m ore moves to get it right.
        Parameters:
        num - how many moves to increase by
